hero.headline: Build Educational Games with
hero.description: Wonderix empowers teachers and parents to create engaging learning experiences through conversation. No coding required—just describe your game idea and watch AI bring it to life.

features.title: Everything You Need to Create
features.subtitle: Wonderix combines the power of AI with intuitive design to help you build games that kids love and everyone can create.

noCode.title: No-Code Platform
noCode.description: Create complex educational games through simple conversations. Describe what you want, and AI handles the rest.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Creation
aiPowered.description: Advanced AI understands educational objectives and automatically generates engaging, age-appropriate content.

madeForEveryone.title: Made for Everyone
madeForEveryone.description: Intuitive tools for creating educational content. Perfect for teachers, parents, and anyone who wants to make learning fun.

engagingGames.title: Engaging Games
engagingGames.description: Kids love learning through play. Create puzzles, quizzes, adventures, and more to make education fun.

customizable.title: Fully Customizable
customizable.description: Personalize characters, themes, difficulty levels, and learning objectives to match your needs.

trackProgress.title: Track Progress
trackProgress.description: Built-in analytics help you understand how students are learning and where they need extra support.

howItWorks.title: Create Games in
howItWorks.subtitle: No technical skills needed. If you can describe it, Wonderix can build it.

describe.title: Describe Your Game
describe.description: Tell Wonderix what kind of educational game you want to create. Specify the subject, age group, and learning objectives.

aiCreates.title: AI Creates Instantly
aiCreates.description: Our AI understands your requirements and generates a complete, playable game with graphics, mechanics, and educational content.

sharePlay.title: Share & Play
sharePlay.description: Customize if needed, then share your game with students. Track their progress and adjust difficulty as they learn.

exclusivePricing.title: Exclusive Pricing:
exclusivePricing.description: Get a lifetime discount as an early supporter

shapeProduct.title: Shape the Product:
shapeProduct.description: Your feedback will directly influence our development
